name: ...and then there's only LOVE.
description: Come celebrate the First Amendment through daily discussions and nightly shows.  Freedom of expression and spirituality is OUR American Dream.

name: 667:The Neighbors of the Beast
description: BRC Hellions unite, and set-up at the invitation of the Dark Lords of Terminal Village. Hothshot the Robot, d6 audio damage, Spectralcodec participant-controlled Video Screens return for the 9th year, movie nite, Jackbot, HU-go2:the Intruder Alert! Robot Centurion, and more await!

name: Home Sweet Home" Camp
description: Everyone should feel right at home at this 50’s style suburban oasis, complete with nuclear family, vintage treats, and a big dose of irony for the wacko desert. Come by and reminesce about the good ol’ days as we welcome you “home sweet home.”

name: Playfully Yours
description: “Playfully Yours” is a dungeonous experiance, our dungeonmaster will instruct and share the pleasures of S&M play in our fully equiped dungeon, you can also interact with others, under his supervision or instruction. An outside chain web is available. Experianced instruction available.

name: A Bordello of Dust
description: Bordello of Dust: Fun & sleazy in the name of art, expression, playfulness and theatrics, not really in the name of sex at all. An Amsterdam Alley of windowed peep show stages for burlesques shows.  Nightly shows of erotica, pole dancing, & more. Want 2 play?

name: A Cavallo
description: As A Cavallo sits in an exotic foreign drydock, after severe storms whipped the crew to tatters, a scout crew explores the frontier in the Bonewagon. Made from deadstuff, piloted by deadfolks, driven by dead horses.

name: A Shack of Sit
description: Weve built a Shack on the Playa. Our Sit doesnt stink – come say HiYa. Whatever your nation or tribe, relax for a while and imbibe cool air in a comfortable chair, a massage, or gastric lavage with the drinks that we plan to supply ya.

name: Above The Limit
description: Darwins Monkey Bar & Treetops Lounge, The Crystal Caverns 40 dome chill space, Cafι Konas coffee & chai, The Royal Barge, Evolution Island Bar, F-15 Interceptor, and over 150 gallons of finest homebrew & exotic beveragesjoin our Beervolution, entertaining friends new and old around the clock!

name: Abstininthe
description: Abstininthe is the friendly bar on the playa,providing our special drink to the thirsty of BRC since the last millenium. Come try our many flavors and enjoy the music, ambience and conversation of our neighborhood bar

name: Academy of Fools
description: Welcome comrades and fools! We are bringing you the team of the globally acclaimed Slavas Snowshow and its’ creator, Slava Polunin, president of the Academy.  We invite all the lovers of life to the foolest to our theatre of ritual magic, pageantry, games & fantasy.

name: Advice Booth Camp
description: Come and sit down for some advice on anything that is concerning you in your life.

name: Airport - BRC Port of Entry
description: BRC International is a real but temporary airport with over 200 planes, skydivers, ultralights, runway, terminal building, customs Inspectors. The Port of Entry Village (at the intersection of 5:00 and the trash fence) is home to aviators, land sailors, theme camps, art cars, and artist

name: AKAirways
description: AKAirways is an art group based in New York City. Our focus is sculpture/installation. The inflatable objects and environments that we create are the central components of our installations.

name: ALBINO!
description: Afrobeat lovers, World-Funk maniacs, LIVE music freaks: ALBINO! camp is home to the nationally-touring 11-piece afrobeat ensemble-ALBINO!; complete with 4-piece horns section, costumes, dancers, and full band choreography.  Think James Brown funk meets World Beat grooves; just add playa dust…

name: Alqmy Camp
description: Metaphysical therapy and purifying transformations served by a squad of transcendental facilitators and guides to the grounded now.

name: Altar-nation
description: Come into an Altar-nation, a place to test our hearts and minds through conection, intention, meditation,  and freedom of self.  Let our alters be a guide for inspiration, hope, love, laughter and peace.

name: Alternative Energy Zone Village
description: If you have an interest in alternative energy, then welcome, you are invited to join our village of friendly folks . You will see and learn about solar panels, wind generators, solar ovens, solar showers, water cleaning, MANY MANY blinky lights, and people who can show YOU how to do it too.

name: Altitude Lounge
description: Join us for drinks, refreshing cold air in the Chill van, and an elevated deck and bar.  We’ll be spinning downtempo grooves at sunset and each night while providing high altitude views of the playa and Opulent Temple.

name: Ambivert's Wild West Saloon
description: This watering hole will be open in the heat of the afternoon Tuesday – Saturday between 1-5pm. Here’s a place to get out of the sun and enjoy a cold one and if you dare take a chance on our game to get an extra shot or two. See Y’all There!

name: American Dreamers
description: A “hotel”, with plenty of room, sleep, meditate, or participate in our dream related workshops. Learn about your dreams and interact with other dreamers.

name: american excess camp
description: American Excess Camp- “A bunch of people with a bunch of stuff you don’t need”

name: American Idle
description: Chill out with our tribute to the great American pastime.  Expect big dreams, big beats, furtive firsts, shag carpet and plenty of couches.

name: American Jungle of Earthly Delights
description: The American Jungle of Earthly Delight is an eclectic dreamscape of our physical and cultural cognitive jungles.  It is a dense, misty mass of contrasts and contradictions where explorers frolick and relax in a maze of interactive games and thirst quenching jungle drinks. Emerge rested and refreshed.

name: American Steel & Steve23 for Mayor
description: Presenting the American Dream, Headless Point style. The crew that brought you some of the biggest art ever seen on the playa (including Crude Awakening and The One Tree) is back! Come play with amazing metal & fire art, learn how to weld, ride in our crane, and VOTE for Steve23 for Mayor of BRC!

name: American Suburban Gladiators
description: What happens when perfect suburbanites in their perfect row houses can’t take their perfectly predictible lives anymore?  They turn into… American Suburban Gladiators! Come battle soccer moms, doctors, business men & mailmen to see if you can complete their insanely suburban tournament course!

name: American Wet Dream Camp
description: Wet and wild nocturnal emissions style. Join a mix bag of Canadian and American playa players (formerly known as “The Web of Destiny” as they jam on this years theme with a 24/7 pajama party celebrating that which goes “Hump” in the night.

name: Amerikesh
description: Luxury oasis providing fusion cuisine for those who wish or need rejuvenation in a plush environment of Persian’esq rugs and simulated maharaja tent.

name: Andy's Wonder Factory
description: Andy Warhol meets Wonder Bread in BRC.  The Factory will be open for you to star in impromptu video interviews, add to the worlds largest Wonder bread dough ball, tag the Wonderwall with your own American dream, or just loaf in the cool shade.

name: Angels & Shamans
description: Renegade Monks, Healers, Angels & Shamans on the Esplanade The Renegage Angelic Shaman returns for his 3rd straight year with world-class, SoulTouch Healing. 200 hours of astounding healings over the last two burns.  A small but select group of World class healers & shamans invited to send resumes

name: Anonymous Village
description: Anonymous Village is an oasis of recovery in the eye of the creation cyclone of Burning Man. We host 12 step meetings AA, NA, Alanon, Naranon and all other recovery based entities. There are regularly scheduled meetings and as needed. We also rescue those that find themselves needing our services.

name: AOXOMOXOA
description: AOXOMOXOA presents AMERICAN BEAUTY. Come by for beautiful music, meet beautiful people with beautiful dreams, and tell us yours! Dancin’, prancin’ ’till the morning comes. “And when you hear that song, come crying like the wind, it seems all this life was just a dream.” -Robert Hunter

name: Apocalypse Lounge
description: Don’t panic. We thought of you: chalk easel boards to create art, seminars on surviving a zombie attack & robot uprising, guided tours (bring hawaiian shirt), “suit night” & a wheel of chance. Come for coffee in the AM & enjoy shade all day; you may see some old faces & meet some new ones.

name: APOKILIPTIKA
description: Located as part of Terminal City, APOKILIPTIKA spins the American Dream theme into its Freedoom and Doomocracy sub-theme, with all sorts of light hearted (and some not so light) twists and jabs on American culture, politics, iconography, foreign policy and more- all with that special APOKILIPTIKA style.  We like art, and will have lots of it in and around the camp.

name: Apres Ski Chalet
description: aa{cent}prA{umlaut}s-ski[ah-prey-skee,ap-rey,noun] The period of relaxation after skiing. A rich cultural heritage at ski resorts worldwide. We have now brought this magic to the playa. After a long day on the slopes come mingle with our snowmen, frolic with our skibunnies, enjoy a glacial beverage!

name: Arachnophobia
description: Arachnophobia is a dark Cabaret, a twisted mix of entertainment.  From goth/industrial tunes to j-pop at night, mixed with cult movies, anime, gothic karaoke, even children’s crafts and much more… Every hour is unique at the big spider.

name: Arcadia
description: Recreating an idyllic interaction between man and nature.

name: Arconauts
description: Pulling cities out of hats and uniting lost socks…

name: Arctica
description: Arctica is the original ice sales camp located inside the Center Camp circle. Hours of operation are Monday through Sunday from 9am – 6pm & Labor Day from 9am – noon. 10lb blocks of ice and 7lb bags of crushed ice can be purchased for $3 each. Ice can also be purchased in the 3 & 9 o’clock plazas.

name: Area 47 - Space Virgins, DV8, ++
description: The Space Virgins & DV8, plus friends from around the world come together to bring the return of Area 47 to the playa.

name: Art Car Camp
description: This is a camp that features bonafide Art Cars that are licensed and insured and function outside of Burning Man in every day society.  This year the Telephone Car by Howard Davis will be heading the camp making its first appearance in the history of Burning Man.

name: Art Model Camp
description: The core of this group is art models at burning man. We welcome professional models, artists, Art Model Fans, and compatible friends from any city or country to camp with or near us space permitting. Our camp activities include posing for drawings, and other events to be announced.

name: art of such n such, the
description: the art of such n such is an art support camp for the fleeble flobbler theme art project.the such n such is a collective of art and artists from the country.we will have delightful shade by day and wood fired caldrons by night placed out front for warming your bones!

name: Art Test Camp:  Plaid
description: this is a test record for playa info directory extracts

name: ArtEast
description: ArtEast is an interactive art gallery designed for anyone who wanted to make art for burning man but did not have the means mainly because of, but not limited to, international travel. we offer never ending art projects that can be added onto by anyone.

name: ARTery
description: This is the on playa headquarters for Burning Man’s art department. Welcome to all the artists that make Burning Man the wonderful art event it is!

name: asana-mania
description: A reality-defying Yoga camp. Please check calendar or drop by to see our schedule of daily classes–yoga and more! If you would like to teach a class in our space, please contact us to be added to the schedule.

name: Ashram Galactica (The Grand Hotel)
description: Your Home Away from Home Away from Home The Grand Hotel at Ashram Galactica sets the standard for hospitality in the Black Rock City Metropolitan Area. Enjoy a crisp cocktail and conversation. Our well-informed and obsequious concierge will be happy to advise the traveler of all the city offers.

name: Asshole Spotlight Camp
description: Come check out our various optical exhibits.  From laser grids to monochromatic sodium bulbs we’ll freak you out with our visual effects.

name: Astral Headwash
description: Good day dirty dwellers! We will be washing hair in the desert again this year. Come visit us with your happy spirits, your smiling faces and your dirty hair and we’ll do our best to make you feel like you’re in heaven. We’ll see you Monday – Friday noon – 4 PM. Remember to arrive early!

name: Astral Lounge
description: Astral Lounge is a small, intimate chill space, providing a cool, shaded oasis of calm during the hottest part of the day, and a mellow, relaxed vibe all night long.

name: Astropups
description: This will be Astropups 8th year of fabulous fun on the playa. We’ll be returning with our own brand of frisky frivolity that Burners have come to know and love.

name: Asylum: Main Street USA
description: Asylum is the solar powered American Main Street of multiple theme camps and art projects. These groups include Camp No Evil, Church of the Pink Sock, King of America, Manifest Blasphemy, Orgasmateria, Psychonauts, Rubber Chicken Camp and Whiskey & Whores Saloon.

name: Austria  no stars, just stripes
description: Play the game and discover the Austrian in yourself! Prove your Austrian skills for example by Jodeln (Austrian singing) or Schuhblattln (Austrian dance) and gain the bronze, silver or golden Edelweiss. Take a rest in the alpinistic chillout-zone and enjoy remixes of Sound-of-Music-songs. Bussi

name: Automatic Subconscious
description: We’re a Boston-based camp, bringing our best all the way to the playa. Come on over, have a drink, chill in our two-story dome, dance, take a class, enjoy, and let us prove to you that we may hail from the rude northeast, but we gots some love to give & smiles we’ve been waiting all year to release.

name: Avalon Village
description: Avalon Village is a large queer/queer friendly village of theme camps including Quixote’s Cabaret, Camp Montage, Astro Pups, Fairyland, Camp Stella, Camp Celestial Bodies, Vietnamese Iced Coffee Camp, and The Uncharted Territories. Come join us for performance, workshops, and playa fun!

name: Avant Yard
description: Hello friend.  You wanna play?  The Avant Yard is home to the Diaspora _A_r_t_s_ _C_o_l_l_e_c_t_i_v_e_,_ _w_h_o_ _b_r_i_n_g_s_ _y_o_u_ _t_h_e_a_t_r_e_!_ _L_a_u_g_h_t_e_r_!_ _I_m_a_g_i_n_a_t_i_o_n_!_ _W_o_r_k_s_h_o_p_s_!_ _ _P_a_r_t_i_e_s_!_ _D_a_n_c_i_n_g_!_ _S_i_n_g_i_n_g_!_ _ _C_o_o_k_i_e_s_!

name: Awakened Mind Tantra
description: Camp for the Vajranandacharya Buddhist school of Tantra and Yoga. Monks from the Awakened Mind Meditation Center in San Francisco will teach free meditation classes. Samvara, the school founder, will perform Darshan and other special Buddhist blessings. Stop by for Enlightenment and fun!

name: Backyard
description: Wander past the picket fence and into The Backyard, a grassy place to play and relax. Enjoy our swing set and games like horseshoes, catch, and slack em. Grab some lemonade and lounge in the hammock, practice yoga, or explore the Magic Garden. Or head for the Dog House, a chilled hideout (BYO ice).

name: Bad Idea Theater
description: “To Serve and Project” Bad Idea Theater once again returns to bring you refreshment of the mind and body. Stop by and visit our expanded lounge and theater complex, providing you the best in Psychotronic entertainment. What’s Psychotronic, you ask? Look here http://www.badideatheater.com/movie_faq.

name: Baggage Check
description: Got some baggage (Fear of commitment? Close-minded? Bitterness over unrequited love?) youd like to get rid of? Dont carry that baggage around with you, leave it with us and well take care of it.  Unclaimed baggage will be burned Sunday night at the temple burn. Emotional baggage only!

name: Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro
description: For the ninth consecutive year one of the most anticipated, revered, outrageous, and personable theme camps makes it’s triumphant return to Black Rock City:  Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro.  Nestled within Wheeeee!Ville BDC&WB will once again be pouring vintage merlot while dismembring Barbies.

name: bass camp
description: The 50hz Healerz beleive in healing the mind body and soul through ground shaking bass.  Our elephant Ganesha will emerge upon the playa daily to provide your daily dose of noise.

name: Bat Country
description: Join Bat Country for a savage journey into the heart of the American Dream. Vibrating hugs, epic rants, mimosa-samosa binging, Purple Moose, spinning bars, interrogation, mutant sounds, hope, fear, love, loathing and damn good books. Come by for Hunter S. Tuesday! “God’s Mercy on You Swine”-HST

name: Bavarian Illuminati M/C
description: The Bavarian Illuminati Motorcycle Cabal and Conspiracy returns to the playa! Learn the Secrets of World Domination! Marvel to the Caustic Mass of the Motorcycle! Register with the Secret Masters! Be initiated into a Genuine Mystery School!Celebrate the Robert. A. Wilson Memorial BBQ! fnord

name: Beaver Knows Best
description: Come by Camp Beaver Knows Best for a trip back in time to 1950’s Americana!  Astroturf, pink flamingos, picket fences, and moms serving after school snacks in aprons! Snack time is from 3:00-5:00pm Daily.

name: beeCHARGE!!!
description: beeCHARGE!!!  Come join our happy swarm of bees for lemonade, iced tea, playground games, and light sabre fights during the afternoons!

name: Bell Camp
description: Visit Bell Camp on your way out to your Playa Adventure, Day or Evening. Join us for a refreshing beverage, and ring the Bell, our beloved camp namesake. Rest for a spell in our dome, and ploy your course to destiny.

name: Between Now and Here
description: Last year we were the Lost Boys, but now, we’re Between Now and Here.  Come visit the love room where wild fantasies become reality, or our Floating Bed – surround sound included.

name: Biergarten - The All American
description: Come practice your keg stand in our all American Beer garden. For a how-to, please see link below.

name: Big Love Defeet
description: THIS FUCKING PLAYA DUST IS RUINING MY FEET!!! Come over between 3pm-6pm every day to let the wives of Camp Big Love Defeet help keep your tender tootsies healthy and happy with foot washes, rubs and lotions aimed at keeping your peds dance-ready and crack free.  SEE YA, TOOTS!

name: Big Mother is Listening
description: Each and every day we are standing on something that has great power. How often do we acknowledge it? Our collective big earth mother pachamama is listening NOW. Come by and show your love while lounging on our large comfy ear.

name: Big Puffy Yellow Camp
description: Do you remember that big full moon balloon object that got you back to your camp last year? Well, we’re back again. This time with music and art cars to feed even more of your sensations. Stop by and chill, dance or simply enjoy the full moon in pitch blackness. We welcome all to the party.

name: Bike Rock City
description: Come get your broken bike fixed. I have no parts, only tools. Barter encouraged.

name: Billion Bunnies: Bunny Nation!
description: Cross the border into the Billion Bunnies’ furree & sovereign Bunny Nation, forsake your icky humanity, and become a Bunny! Pass through Ellis Warren and be Bunnified & Naturalized to enjoy the many privileges of citizenship, day (Billion Bunny March, Hopstacle course) & night (Bunny Lounge & Bar).

name: Bioluminati
description: Bioluminati has been illuminating the Playa for thirteen years with art installations, feasts, art quests, and now: PIMP MY BIKE; the bling-ification station where Black Rock Citizens upgrade their rides with that extra get-up-and-glow. Open Daily. And every evening, Micro Cinema!

name: Black Forest Bars Gypsy Punk Dream
description: Come Drink, Sing, Dance, Enjoy as Your Black Forest Bar explores our Gypsy Punk Dream!

name: Black Rock Arts Foundation
description: The Black Rock Arts Foundation invites you to contribute to our on-playa ScrapEden project. This year, we’ll create an interactive installation using reclaimed fabric. We invite you to screen print, quilt, sew or paint words onto fabric that speak about art and community. Contact us to participate!

name: Black Rock Beacon
description: We will be producing a daily newspaper for Black Rock City with a mix of fun articles and serious news. Our Press Club & News Room will provide shade and refreshment for ourselves as well as other members of the press and interested burners.

name: Black Rock Boutique
description: Come on down to the BLACK ROCK BOUTIQUE and let our fashion consultants slip you into something a little more questionable! Be a STAR and STRUT YOUR STUFF on our runway. Check the WHO, WHAT, WHERE for our highly anticipated “theme parties”.

name: Black Rock Brews and Shoes
description: Home-Brews and Horse-shoes, the perfect summer combination.  Come hang out and drink some cold delicious beer and play some horse-shoes; tournaments every afternoon.

name: Black Rock Bureau of Hospitality
description: Not having the shiniest Burning Man? Wandering aimless and feeling stuck? Comfy sofas, interesting conversation, massage, Vision Quest Roulette and the Free Advice booth all await you… stop by and feel the Playa love at the Black Rock Bureau of Hospitality! Turn Your Burn Around!

name: Black Rock Burning Bingo
description: BINGO!!!  Boom with a flame lit sky, we have another winner.  Bring a prize take a prize while you rest your feet in a great american past time.

name: Black Rock City Canoe Club
description: Back from 2 years on hiatus, we’re burning brighter than ever, with our own inimitable je ne sais quoi conjurings: Chef Daddys O****m Omelette, Fishmongers Playa Chowder, or, new for this year, the Patriotic Pudding du jour  theres just no telling whats on the waft. Seek the red canoe!

name: Black Rock City Community Center
description: Every community needs a center of support for those truly dedicated to normalcy, perhaps nowhere more so than BRC. We provide fun-house mirror reflections of all of the usual church-basement standards: bingo night, scouting get-togethers, AA (Alcohol is Awesome) meetings, and so forth. BRCCC: We’re Here To Help. Maybe.

name: Black Rock City Fallout Shelter
description: strolling along the dusty streets of Black Rock City, you come upon an elevator.  Above the elevator doors is the universal fallout shelter sign, to your right, a button with a down arrow. Press the button.

name: Black Rock City Fitness Center
description: At the Black Rock City Fitness center we are dedicated to what makes America sizzle…tight buns, deep fried. The Thigh Master meets the fry master, in spandex.  We invite you to exorcise the demons with gateau-aerobics(free cake weight lifting), Kentucky Fried. Get gateau fabulous and feel the burn!

name: Black Rock City Hardware Shoppe
description: The Black Rock City Hardware Shoppe will be onsite with a variety of tools and supplies to help fix or build things that are broke or need to be built on the playa. We’ll have hand tools, power tools, bike parts, fasteners, duck tape, etc. Open every day from the time we get up till sundown.

name: Black Rock City Post Office
description: Join our host of performance artists in sending mail anywhere, on playa or off. We’ve got original art playa stamps, harassment postcards, bureaucracy, stickers, adult experiences, and surprises. Work the counter or traverse the playa as a Delivery Specialist or both; sign on for one shift or dozens.

name: Black Rock Diner
description: Changing lives, one grilled cheese sandwich at a time. The Black Rock Diner serves up grilled cheese, groovy music, and good vibrations to our late night playa neighbors from about 2pm until dawn.  Over the years, BRD has evolved into a favorite underground chillspace for those wanting a little warmth in the whey hours of the morning.  Come for the comfort food, and stay for the friendly community and ribald conversation.

name: Black Rock Electric
description: “We power the playa…”

name: Black Rock Fun Jet
description: Visit Black Rock Fun Jet, check your baggage at the door, and join us on a journey to one of our fabulous states of mind.

name: Black Rock JCC
description: America, the land of opportunity for generations of immigrants, including Jews. The Black Rock JCC is your shuk, synagogue and neighborhood hangout when you make it to the gold paved streets of Black Rock City.

name: Black Rock Lemonade
description: Serving cold lemonade to dusty humans

name: Black Rock Roller Disco
description: The Black Rock City’s roller rink will be in the house!!!  We have Black Rock Rollergirls are doing roller derby games and the band “Soul Glow” will be playing on Friday night. We’ll have a bigger rink, more skates and the old school funk and roller disco music will make you dance all night long.

name: Black Rock Solar
description: Black Rock Solar – Free the Sun

name: Black Rock Spatial Delivery
description: Our uniformed bike messengers have served our community with playawide delivery services for your missives, parcels, letters, schwag since 1999.  This year we are recruiting the stout of heart and the sturdy of sinew to join our legions of deliverators…more riders, more bikes, more deliverators!

name: Black Rock Travel Agency
description: Once again, hospitality. All love, all groin. This year, in line with the new “American” theme, we will be lovin’ babies pretty much 24/7. Oh, and mothers too. All love, all the time. Mothers and babies. BRTA, since ’37.

name: Black Rock University Heights, Inc
description: The development of BRC’s premier University has now attracted sufficient investors to create its own inclusive gated community, Black Rock U Heights!Look no further for both intellectual stimulation (featuring liquid thinkTanks) and residential satisfaction. Thing is, which side of the gates are we?

name: Black Rock Yearbook
description: Black Rock Yearbook Recording your memories, so you don’t have to! Stop by solo or with your whole class for your 08 yearbook photo. Our honor/detention bar will be open as long as are so bring your own cup…

name: Black Rose City Halluci-Nation
description: A collective consciousness from Portland Oregon; Home of: The Bumble Bus, an amazing tribe of people, connective experiences, mind expansion, and universal intelligence. Let us delight your senses and tickle your imagination.

name: Blacklight Aquarium, The
description: Visit Blaqua’s Immigration Station and test for naturalization so you, too, can live the American Dream. Pass, and you will be conferred citizenship and receive a personalized passport. Fail, and you may just get a green card. Also, stop by for an evening of aquatic espionage on James Spawn night.

name: Blazin Raisin Camp
description: Blazin Raisin-a place to chill, relax & have a good time.In the spirit of our community on the playa & abroad, our home is your home.Please feel free to stop by & enjoy some delicious organic fruits, music or just to say hello. We will be serving cereal & coffee in the mornings a the Peace Bowl Cafe

name: BLD
description: Join us for the fifteenth anniversary celebration of Newt’s bar. Nightly “Burn the Man” contests, Welding Skool, and a Burning Man Museum. Also… sorry about that thing last year.

name: Bling Bling
description: Camp Bling Bling brings Arms Across the Playa to Burningman this year. Visit us at www.myspace.com/armsacrosstheplaya to find out more about our vision. Our camp offers fun and games to all; Bocce Ball Tournaments, Trampolines and more…

name: BLOOP!
description: “The Future is Better Together.” We want to create a more compassionate world by bringing fun & joy to the playa. Enjoy wine and cheese while having your toe nails painted, or be gifted with one of life’s simplist & purest of pleasures, Kissing! http://current.com/items/77032162_ playa_kissing_booth

name: Blue Oasis
description: Each evening movies will be presented in the Blue Oasis Theater.  Enjoy movies on a big screen under the stars with full stereo sound.  Our film collection includes big name feature films, cult movies and true art collectables.  Or, bring your own (DVD format only) and arrange for a special showing.  The planned program for each night will be displayed on the marquee at the front of the theater.

name: bmanbutton camp
description: bmanbutton camp is the place to make pin on buttons you make your own and have a photo one made too. from your own camera are we take a picture for you

name: BMIR 94.5 FM
description: BMIR 94.5 FM is your one-stop sonic stomping grounds in Black Rock City. Listen on-playa for music, news, interviews, emergency info, and more. Better yet: drop by to chat on air, record your announcement from noon to 4PM, or frolic with us for our daily 5PM festivities.

name: Bohemia
description: Stop by Bohemias Art Appreciation Society and make your own trophy to hand out on the playa. Let your friends, family and neighbors know how much you appreciate the time, energy and thought that went into building our beautiful city.?

name: Bomb Bay Tea Company
description: Bomb Bay Tea Co. is proud to provide tea, dainties and games of culture and breeding to the denizens of Black Rock City in a relaxed environment of steampunk opulence. Join us Monday through Thursday for exquisite afternoon tea and refined entertainment.

name: Boozy BUNKO
description: Everyone knows that simple dice games are best played tipsy, so we invite you to join us for Boozy BUNKO daily at 11am. BUNKO virgins are welcome and will be deflowered lovingly.

name: Box Canyon Burners
description: Join us for a taste of Telluride and good old American pastimes. Afternoon activities and wholesome games such as horseshoes, bocci ball, beer pong, and an interactive ski-rubex game. We’ll recreate the Telluride Freebox– one burner’s old costume is another’s evening flare! Thats American Spirit!

name: BOXXUS NEXUS
description: The gracious god of godlessness, beneficent Boxxus Nexus, beckons you to consociate with curious compatriots whilst availing yourself of his abundance of economic, alcoholic potation. Come make some new friends over cheap boxed wine! …and let’s make some noise for World Peace!!! (BYO Goblet)

name: BRAIN FREEZE / GOT STICKERS CAMP
description: Again this year Brain Freeze/Got Stickers Camp will be bringing frozen margaritas to the Playa. We will also have stickers to trade and share. We will also be bringing back our famous electric chair “Old Sparky”, for those that need a quick recharge.

name: Brand-UR-Ass 'N More
description: Brand-UR-Ass ‘N More will stimulate your entire being, from your mind to your ass. Bare your butt at the hitchin post and get a fun temporary brand, your soul to our Speedtherapist, your spirit at Moonbeams Reiki touch, and your thirst at the Mr. Rogers Memorial Martini Bar. Y’all come and play!

name: BRC Animal Control
description: Since 2001, BRCAC has collected playa creatures, tagging them for research & easy recognition. BRCAC will use the latest techniques to allow these animals to be reintroduced to the playa. BRCAC will also wow BRC with its very own Tequila Pit Crew & by continuing its quest to find the Winner of BM.

name: BRC Photo Studio - April Massirio
description: BRC Photo Studio’s photographer, April Massirio, will be creating images of the people of the playa for gallery walls. This is your chance to show the world all the self-expression you bestow, so come in your playa best!

name: BRCPO/BMCPO
description: Black Rock City Post Office/ Burningman Community Post Office BRCPO/BMCPO. There’s no team in Fuck You, and there’s no Fuck You in the team; in us we trust.

name: Breakfast at Trixie's
description: Remember the small town cafes in Iowa or Nebraska where it’s breakfast and talk – politics, crops, who’s shackin’ with who..  We’re serving buckwheat pancakes mornings til the batter runs out.  Chow and gossip!  Watch out for Trixie, ya better behave, she’ll slap ya around.  BRING PLATES ‘n FORKS!

name: Brigit
description: A camp for admirers, followers, and lovers of Brigit. Join us for a White Chocolate Martini at our White party, leave an offering at the Brigit shrine, and let your light shine bright.

name: Brit Camp
description: Bringing a little bit of Blighty to the Playa for the delectation of all Brit-loving Burners or for those just craving a proper cuppa tea. We gladly offer an alternative flavour of red, white and blue, besides impromptu lessons in irony and queuing which are given upon request.

name: Brooklyn, Ca
description: Brooklyn, Ca, USA Red, Gold, and Green One love.

name: Bubble Lounge
description: Visit the Bubble Lounge at Mal-Mart.  In the great American tradition blow some hot air into a swirling globe of illusion in an attempt to assure everyone that all’s right in the the world even though the structure you are creating is only one molecule thick, much like our foreign policy.

name: Bubble Wrap Trap
description: We are a group of musicians, performers and Yogis who love a great dance, some growth work and the effervescent pop of bubble wrap. Come Play!

name: BuddhaCamp@theLotusDome
description: When deluded one is an ordinary being; when enlightened one is called a Buddha. Life proceeds along a path; though invisible, it definitely leads to absolute happiness-that path is the road of the Mystic Law of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo. BuddhaCamp@theLotusDome Bringing True Buddhism to the playa since 2007!

name: Bumblepuss
description: Bumblepuss houses all the Bumbles and their bumbling activities at the Nectar Village.

name: Bunny Camp
description: Bunny Camp is a furtopian oasis for all things Bunny. We hereby renounce our dirty stinking messed up carcass of failed and foibled humanity in order to evolve as a sentient furry being. When will you be Bunnified?

name: Burner Hostel Staff retreat
description: After 10 successful years, Hagey and the crew of the Black rock International Burner Hostel are taking a siesta!!! Thats right – this year, our Dream is to kick back, drink mint duleps, and otherwise relax!!! As always, everyone is more than welcome to call round, but we may be asleep! Finally!

name: Burner Scout Camp
description: We are Burner Scouts, and we want people to take the oath to become a participatory and responsible citizens of Black Rock City. We will be handing out sashes and badges based on the story YOU share with us or talent you demonstrate!

name: Burners without Borders
description: Burners without Borders is what happens when we take the values from the playa and apply them in meaningful ways in our local communities. The BWB meme is spreading, and powerful projects across the globe are led by members of the community. Check out what we are up to at one of our daily salons.

name: Burning Dream Foreclosures & Repos
description: Warning to those in default on their theme camp payments: The BURNING DREAM FORECLOSURE & REPO camp agents will be out in force to repossess your American Dream. You may also be taken into our custody around the playa inside our caged mobile REPO wagon. We say: “Go ahead & dream, cause thats the only way youre going to see your shit again!” Dreamers Beware!!

name: Burning Green eXpress
description: We’re a camp of Seattle area Burners committed to providing shipping services for our community to Critical Massive and to Black Rock City. We haul bins, tents, shade structures, art, rebar, almost anything (no emotional baggage – sorry!).

name: Burning Love
description: Arrange to have a unique wedding ceremony at our camp that will not soon be forgotten. This will be a wedding ceremony you will be able to tell everyone about! Be sure to talk with us in advance. We cannot do this without talking to you before Burning Man.

name: Burning Mary
description: Come chill in our homochic lounge. Enjoy soothing beats, an ice cold Burning Mary, and banter with spicy queens.

name: Burning Sam Camp
description: Home of the Burning “Uncle” Sam Parade. Wednesday, gather @ 5. Parade @6 pm. Wear your star spangled best, bring signs and shakers. Western Victoriana allies of the Bomb Bay Tea Company. Providing celebration, a cup of brown joy and tasseography (tea leaf reading)to the citizens of Black Rock City

name: BurningSky
description: Skydiving, Fireflies (non-skydiver airplane rides), Aerial Art Exhibition, Aerial Photography and Videography are some of the many aspects of BurningSky. Stop by and enter a contest to win an observer ride with the skydivers as we jump over BRC from 12,000 feet above the playa.

name: Burntown
description: Burntown is an eclectic, eccentric, yet somehow concentric collection of individuals from Auburn and the surrounding foothills of Northern California. Our camp on the playa is the culmination of preparation, practice, and community gatherings that take place year-round.

name: Burntown 2 Electric Boogaloo
description: We are a collection of artists, builders, healers, dreamers and freaks who love being a part of burningman.

name: Busted!
description: Busted! Where you come when you’re busted; to enjoy shade, mellow tunes, good company, and iced tea or lemonade. Make some art or just lounge on our cushy furniture and have a great conversation. The right daytime spot for your busted needs.

name: Camp 54
description: Yaaargh! Hoist th’ black flag and raise yer saber, thar be pirates guardin this camp.  Hosting tha one and only PIRATE HAPPY HOUR, bring yer wenches and grab some grog an come join the lost pirates of Camp 54 in revelry.

name: Camp Armageddon
description: Camp Armageddon is Bay Area Camp that comes together every year to build, dress up and celebrate free expression – don’t be alarmed if you hear anyone of us yelling out ‘Armageddon!’. It’s not the end of the world silly, it’s our camp call!

name: Camp Blank
description: “Step riiiight up!” A once-in-a-lifetime chance to witness a stupendous array of secret talents by the most extraordinary people on the planet, who have risked dismemberment, death and humiliation to bring you a head-exploding, karma-resistant extravaganza.

name: Camp Carribean
description: Camp Carribean is about Carribean music, community, culture and the welcoming of everyone to sit, relax, and chat. We honor diversity, spiritual growth and evolution. and LOVE.

name: Camp Chippatooth
description: Flags of our Burners is a chance for people to design and paint their own version of the American Flag.  How would you depict your graphic vision of America?  In addition we plan to collect data on what people did with their economnic stimulus checks and send it to the White House and Congress.

name: Camp CONTACT
description: We are dedicated to the physical exploration of bodies in contact, AKA the art of Contact Improvisation. We offer daily workshops for all levels (Fundamentals of Contact plus more advanced classes) as well as hosting the morning contact jam in Center Camp.

name: Camp Dustification
description: Come one come all to get your dust mask for the major daytime event, yep you guessed it the dust storm.  Stop by Camp Dustification to decorate your memorable dust mask.  We will have a disposable dust mask for anyone who wants one.  And one special adornment of a stamp with the almighty Burning man!

name: Camp Fishy
description: Hello All,               After another successful year, and with much pleading, we are back. Camp Fishy always says yes!!

name: Camp Gallavant
description: Ahoy, we’re The Pirates Of The Playa (infamous creators of the Mutant Vehicle, USS Nevada). We love to Gallavant across the playa spreading fun and adventure wherever we go! Visit us at Redirection Connection Village, the new "Loading Station" for the "Official Public Transit System" of BRC!

name: Camp Green Zone
description: Camping for working journalists.

name: Camp Hanging Chad
description: Camp Hanging Chad is the Black Rock City Polling place.  The camp will be outfitted with an official voting machine, polls open all hours for the election of the "village idiot". Camp Hanging Chad will also provide stripper poles (candidates required to dance).

name: Camp Herring 1:1 Scale
description: Camp Herring is back in town bigger than ever (1:1 Scale)               This time we have more and bigger fish.               If you want to experience Norwegian language barriers and chaos at it’s best               Dress properly and pay us a visit.               Uh… No Nudity.

name: camp hookup
description: Camp Hookup is comprised of a random crew, from nurses to mechanics, environmentals to artists, boarders to bikers and other assorted interesting characters. Our playa mission is to hook you up, armed with our hookup cases and their seemingly infinite capacity we are equipped to take care of you.

name: Camp I Am
description: Camp I Am is home to the Panoramic Photo Wall which has been on the Esplanade since 2000, live bands

name: Camp Incendiary Nation
description: This year, come live in C.I.N. and the members of Arizona’s Stage6Productions!               Camp Incendiary Nation, with a Full bar, Nightly Fire Performances and Open Spin Jam with daily Fire Performance Workshops,music, DJ’s and other live performances.

name: Camp Insex
description: Camp Insex is here to share the love of all arthropods with the people.  Stop by and ask any burning questions you have of the spineless and chitin encased -share tattoos, stories, anecdotes, fables, jokes etc.

name: Camp Jello Shot
description: Camp Jello Shot– Bringing you cool refreshments and cooler music since 2001.

name: Camp Klepto
description: The original Kamp Klepto was conceived on the playa during "Floating World". 5 guys, 1 tarp, 2 turntables, 3 sticks of wood, 1 generator and a lot of vodka. As we started to build others started to donate and camp klepto was born! 7 years later we are still going strong!

name: Camp Little Bitty
description: Are you feeling little at Burning Man this year? Come feel big again amongst our Faerie Village! Walk through our little bitty houses that have all been hand made from all over the country.

name: Camp MahnaMahna
description: Camp MahnaMahna               (mahna mahna(ba dee bedebe)mahna mahna(ba debe dee)Mahna Mahna!(ba dee bedebe bedebe badebe debe de-de de-de-de)               The bike in, walk in, crawl in, dance theater presenting different features nightly. A desertized, dusty revamp of the Americana drive-in theater.

name: Camp Make Good Choices
description: To maintain the American dream in BRC we must make good choices. There are only 168 hours of playa time. In the comfort of our chill dome we will help you decide whether to take an art car to the temple or bike ride to the DEEP END. Hang in our chill dome, have a drink, and listen to our sage advice.

name: Camp Montage
description: Camp Montage uses ‘Art’ to document ‘Art’, creating original works of ‘montage’ art from the digital images of talented Burning Man photographers.  At our Black Rock City art gallery we display over 50 large prints and numerous backlit montages, featuring art photographed on the playa from 2005-2007

name: Camp No Evil
description: We live, love, and laugh together.  Learn to leave your trace on one another, not on the Playa.  This is how we live forever.

name: Camp Nomadia
description: Camp Nomadia is home to nomads, wanna-be nomads, part time nomads, domestic nomads, international nomads, technomads, lowtechnomads, former nomads, land nomads, ocean cruising nomads, friends of nomads, etc… Come learn about nomadism, and join us for giant Settlers of Catan and Nomadic Happy Hour.

name: Camp Questionmark (CAMP?)
description: CAMP? is the place where questions come to sit and marinate. We believe that questioning stimulates critical thinking, and alternative ways of looking at things. We invite you to come and feed your answers to our hungry questions, and maybe even leave some questions of your own!  ?UESTION EVERYTHING!

name: Camp rEVOLution
description: Bringing the rEVOLution of Nor-Cal to the American Dream.  A place where sharing the LOVE is promoted and embraced!

name: Camp Shrunken Heads
description: Camp Shrunken Heads is back. We will be making heads, decorating thems and such. We will again have lots of stencils for tees and such. Also, new this year is a geodesic dome held together by bvungee cords and carabeeners. Inside of it will be a tropical rainforest of silk flowers and pool.

name: Camp Spectacular
description: After many burns these spactacular souls have banded together to exemplify their version of the american dream.  Drop in to cool out from the heat.

name: Camp Stella
description: Camp Stella is a Burning Man theme camp of diverse queer and queer friendly folks who have agreed to experience Burning Man clean and sober for the duration of the event.  Some of us are active in AA and other 12 step programs.  Others are not. Camp Stella hosts open AA meetings during the week.

name: Camp Tramp Stamp
description: Camp Tramp Stamp offers artful body stamps as our signature emblem.We are sharing our American Dream with a party deck for entertaining guests with refreshing beverages and some welcomed shade while encouraging others to bring positive energy to our deck (including a wedding!!).

name: Camp Unofficial
description: Camp Unofficial is aiming to return to the 3:00 plaza to make Snow Cones and dispense guidance and counsel. Courtesy of our new snow cone maker, we will be serving SUPER-SIZED portions of the American Dream — as long as your dream consists of ice, sugar and cheap booze!               We will also be offering a full array of GUIDE SERVICES and information. "The Customer is Always Right, Unless You Are TOTALLY Wrong!" — that’s been our motto for over two years of award-winning customer service. This year, our guides will be VERY helpful! We promise. All our guidance is FREE and 100% ACCURATE (void where prohibited).

name: Camp Upsie-Dasium
description: Camp Upsie-Dasium is an international venture that will               provide a gallery for art and artists, and a space expression and               activities.  Come enjoy all this and more as you relax in our large               public shade structure.  Refreshments and art supplies provided.  All               models and artists welcome.

name: Camp World B Free
description: A learning annex gone mad. A communal headquarters for gleeful chaos & construction. Outlaws from all lands converge to teach, heal and play… oh how we play. Yoga at Sunset, improv classes daily & laughter and punching light in the darkness through bright spirits & public theater all week long.

name: Camp... in Bed / Philthy Sanchez
description: Camp … in Bed: a sweet and spicy spot where you will find a group of Epicurean freaks who will spice up your days with their killer hot salsa, chill your afternoons with ice cold beer, and sweeten your nights with custom fortune cookies.  Come and meet the infamous Philthy Sanchez in the flesh!

name: Campo Alegre
description: Step into our oasis in the desert our * Shadow Box * We make it easy for you to express your true selves in a comfortable, intimate area of mutual respect and expression.  Expressions will become a shadow play for others as the soft interior light projects your movements on               the outside of the tent.

name: Canadian Wet Dream
description: Come join our Crazy Queer Canucks bringing the Canadian dream of street hockey (and hooping) to your local Neighborhood.  Mullets, Hockey sticks (hoops)and nets provided for A Good Ol’ Street Hockey Game.

name: Carbofuckination
description: Black Rock Brewing is back! Come enjoy a cold one on the Playa with us!

name: Carbon Dioxide
description: We are a bunch of punk technical artists from around the SouthWest, organized around the theme of our precious waste gas, CO2, only slightly ironically. We individually and collectively produce works of art, community organizing, cultural events, with punk DIY, mutual aid aesthetic.

name: Carny Camp
description: Carny’s Unite! All you rubes out there come try your hand at real Carny games. Our bone yard is most welcoming and the roots don’t get no deeper than our clan. Bring all your kin folk too.

name: Cartoon Commune
description: Cartoon Commune is a haven for all cartoon lovers, cartoon makers, and anyone that lives in a cartoon.  We will be hosting cartooning classes, a chili giveaway, and our Happy Happy Joy Joy Hour for our fellow Ren and Stimpy fans.

name: Castra Roto Thema Thematis-C.R.T.T
description: We provide 24-hour entertainment with themes changing daily and/or hourly.  Join us for Candy or a Spanking, Drunken Pirate Sno-cone Day, Auditory Harassment, share your dreams on Ameridome, and hang with Paris in the Snyde Lounge. We keep it fun and funky with performance, music, Art & Good Company

name: Cave of the Echo People a` Trois
description: Cave of the Echo People are a band of nomads who exist to enhance the American open arms               experience of the playa. "Kiddies will enjoy playa ‘games under the guise of "Hell Yes! We’re Open".               Bask in the sights and sounds of Reflection… enjoy the comfort of the Cave.

name: Celestial Bodies
description: Let Freedom Ring – Come free yourself in our lounge bar, enjoy one of our famous Playa Cosmo, kick back and relax. Join the BRC American Scream showcasing singers, dancers, and other performers. Come walk in our Freedom Bell Garden and join us for the Miss UnAmerican Pageant and parade.

name: Cheese Bag Pipe
description: Celebrating the diversity of the American experience, by sharing delicious quesadillas and live bagpipe music. We encourage anyone, with any talent, (no matter how mediocre) to come and express themselves, we will supply an audience, or possibly just ignore you.

name: Chop Shop
description: Chop Shop is a small Playa Neighborhood Garage that is ready to help all modes of playa transportation with parts,repair,and advice. While you visit our shop, Please enjoy our Shade Oasis, Daily Chop Shop Specials and service with a smile.

name: Chorus of Dreams
description: Chorus of Dreams is a dance theater performance in two acts. Using the surreal mind-bending visuals of blacklight theater, and live music, archetypes of American history and identity are, re-fashioned, made new from the accidental detritus of the 21st century into the plowshares of a hopeful vision.

name: Church of the Pink Sock
description: Church of the Pink Sock – We specialize in Matrimony, Counseling, Communion, Cattle-calling, and Craps.  No Money Down!!!!! Low Apr!!!! Financing Available to those who Qualify.  Salvation Guaranteed, or your soul back! Tiki-Bar serving the Pink Sock Special Open Daily!               Take-out only!! No Delivery

name: Circus Boot Camp
description: Come earn your clown nose by participating in Circus Boot Camp!  We’ll teach you to juggle, unicycle, hoop, slack line, trapeze, crack a whip and other circus-inspired arts.

name: Circus Maximus
description: The Circus Maximus (Latin for greatest circus) is an ancient hippodrome and mass entertainment venue formerly located in Rome and recently relocated to the Playa.  Come join us for the new bacchanalia.

name: Cirque de Flambe
description: Cirque de Flambe, born on the plays, dying on the playa.  No other place in the world now, will let the Cirque light up your eyes.  Finally last show, Wednesday, August 27th at 10 PM.  Scorched earth policy in effect for all audience members, bring eye protection for front row seating on playa.

name: Citizen Earth
description: We are not only Citizens of the US, We are Citizen Earth. The Earth and Sun provide this tea party with the sun tea of the day, fresh cookies baked daily in our solar ovens and by night solar charged batteries illuminate the mushrooms, trees and pillows in this comfy wonderland called Earth.

name: Clan Destiny
description: Clan Destiny is the Meta Love Zone of Tribal Family and Temple of YES Community based in Santa Cruz, Bay Area and Beyond! Come join us for  Sacred Pipe Ceremony, Sound Healing, Kirtan Spontaneous Acoustic Music, Green Technologies, Sharing, Friends, and Zen Fire Garden Meditations and Play.

name: Clevian Circularity
description: Clevian Circularity (since 1998) has connected people from Wisconsin to Burning man. Home of Playa Speed Dating every night!

name: Club Verboten
description: Club Verboten returns to serve the Popular Masses with retro electronica,some Gorilla Zoe and friends new electronica and a new mid-week afternoon program for those who know us only for Saturday nights.

name: Coffee Zombies
description: Bleary-eyed and zombified from yesterday’s adventures?  Come feel the love with us, Portland’s Coffee Zombies, as we animate you, the walking dead.

name: Cohesion
description: Drop by Cohesion for a drink at the Really Good Bar, a round of bowling at Balls of Justice, or just waste time at Procrastination Station. Also look for answers to your questions at the Temple of Bill Hicks. If you are lucky you may show up in time to see some live music too.

name: Comfort & Joy
description: Restore your body and lift your spirits at Comfort & Joy, a gay community center & faggot oasis that offers daily events including yoga classes, discussion groups, skill building workshops and outrageous performances every night.

name: Concentration Camp
description: The most mind stimulating bar on the playa. With an observation tower to see over the playa and a huge shade structure to stay out of the sun we welcome all to come play a game of chess, stare at a magic eye poster, or solve riddles for drinks! crazy concentration contests all week long.

name: Conexus Radiance Factory
description: The Conexus Radiance Factory manufactures and distributes environmentally friendly LED lighting for BM art installations. These are small but powerful rechargeable-battery-powered RGB LED lights which can generate any color lighting under user control. Swing by and pick up your LuminArt Light today!

name: Consensual Art Camp
description: Ever wonder what would happen if a large group of people merged their creativity to produce miraculous pieces of artwork.  Wonder no more, just stop by and see what comes into being.  Bring your creativity and become part of the process. (If you lack an imagination one may be provided for you)

name: Contraptionists
description: Contraptonists is a quiet place to pause in our shady, cool, and comfortable Nebula lounge and have a snow cone or maybe a smoothie if you time it right, before participating in a game of Naked Misting Twister  in our misted shade tent, no clothes or spectators allowed. sox optional

name: Cool Aid Oasis
description: Come get COOL with us during the hottest part of the               day! AID yourself with one of our delicious treats;               Shaved Ice, chilled fruit, cold drinks await you in               our OASIS. Enjoy be misted by one of our friends while               sipping on that drink. Maybe you have a drum or a               guitar, maybe your voice is waiting to be heard;               chill with us and share what you have to offer while               enjoying good company.

name: Coolimator
description: The Coolimator, where you can get out of the heat into a moist chilled room of moving air and lounge in artic bliss. Open to everybody 24-7.

name: CoolTown
description: An oasis in the desert, open while it’s sunny out. CoolTown is a fully misted community shade structure to chill, rest, relax, and socialize or use our self service misting station.  We have body/hair rinsing mornings and afternoons. Occasionally, snow cones are served from the giant penguin that lives here.

name: Cosmic Giggle
description: Cosmic Giggle presents: Muscle Tea. Come get your burn on at our Muscle Tea crossfit gym. Participate in the workout of the day or cheer others on while enjoying tea at our Muscle Tea lounge. Feel the Burn!

name: Cosmic Recess
description: Cosmic Recess is a playAground with a space theme.  Our playAground elements consist of (but not limited to) Barbitar-the fortune telling drama queen; The Sun-Shrine (A recycled 23′ art installation & eye candy sculpture); Uranus 4 square; Mars tetherball and the Black Hole full sized Bowling Alley!

name: Costco Soulmate Trading Outlet
description: Find your soulmate at the Costco Soulmate Trading Outlet.               Drop by, fill out a questionnaire, talk with our friendly staff and enjoy a drink at our bar.               Come back the next day to discover your soulmate and journey off to find               your new friend out there on the playa!

name: CouchSurfing Camp
description: A space where the weary, wild and wondrous travelers are always welcome.               Generosity and a shared world vision is the fundamental nature of               couchsurfers. This camp is about "CouchSurfing" around the world and we are all members of the CouchSurfing.com Project;               Come sit, enjoy and surf the mutant sofa!
hometown: Mutant Sofa, Black Rock City, NV

name: Cougar Melon Camp
description: Come get your fix of two great American institutions, cougars and melons. Grab a refreshing slice at our Smalltown Plaza, along with an all-American dose of your favorite addictions–church, TV, and cars–all with that Black Rock City twist.

name: Crane Camp
description: Crane camp, deep Playa equipment yard.

name: Crazy Horse
description: Hommage to the horse. Come down and rock on one of our horses or have a drink at the Corral Bar or Explore the Tipi Lodge of Chiefs. Home of the Pyramix, 30 foot rolling Pyramid with lit dance floors. Gumbo for our friends, rides on the Pyramix and lots of music, thats our American Dream.

name: Crown Collective
description: Crown Collective: Home port for the mystical Krewe of the Lady Sassafrass, the Playa’s own magical Mississippi Paddlewheeler. Sailings to embark constantly and without notice, with entertainment sporadically provided by Louisiana’s own legendary Shaman of the blues, Coco Robicheaux. Yeah, you right.

name: Curch of Chill
description: A chill place to sooth your mind, improve your mood, and get your groove.

name: Cyphertown Village
description: Cyphertown is the gathering place for Hip Hop Artists and Enthusiasts on the Playa!  With an emphasis on Live Art, Cyphertown features MCs, Dancers, Graff Writers, Poets, Live Loopers, DJs, and Acoustic Musicians.  Cyphertown will be offering Racial Healing Workshops and other chances to Participate.

name: D Pink W
description: Our friends at DPW, the Department of Public Works, build Black Rock City.  We thank them for that. We at D Pink W, decorate with pink, live in pink tents, drink pink cocktails, and wear pink clothes.  Come on by and enjoy the Pink!

name: Damn Fuckin Texans
description: Non-Texans, Texans, Texans-that-have-moved-away-for-whatever-reasons-and-dont-live-here-anymore-and-everyone-else, please stop by.  We’re in Giggsville this year, find us near the super tall Red Neon Man.  The lovin and pillowasis await.

name: Death Guild / Thunderdome
description: Two men enter, one man leaves

name: Debase Camp
description: A collective of like-minded participants, which will provide scheduled events including The Black rock City Combat Club, Journey Friday, in-camp bands and Yoga sessions from an actual Kundalini Yoga instructor.  A chill, shaded space with eclectic music choices and a comfortable atmosphere.

name: deBOCCEry
description: deBOCCEry is an interactive camp based upon building community through PLAY by providing a laid back environment for people to come together and interact. BOCCE is the perfect vehicle for this because the rules are simple and it won’t kill you during the heat of the day.. or maybe it will.

name: Deep Heaven: Living the Dream
description: At Deep Heaven: Living the Dream we share our hearts with the Playa through a commitment to authenticity and honesty.  Look for the heart beacon by night, the rotating heart mirror by day, walk the heart labyrinth, seek out our hug zones, and attend a playshop in our dome.

name: DeMentha Camp
description: DeMentha is a mint-themed camp offering lovingly prepared mojitos each afternoon in our well shaded structure. You will also be soothed with mint teas, minty massage chair, music from our minty DJ lineup, minty misting system, dancing and more.

name: Den of Iniquity
description: The Den for leather and Goth social, dance and play activities. A place for people with interests in the practice and learning about select aspects of bondage and sm play. Some activities are afternoon presentations, Goth Dance party Monday and Friday nights and a leather play party Wednesday night.

name: Department of Dreamland Security
description: The Department of Dreamland Security will ensure a safe and smooth passage into your own Dreamworld. We are here to protect your Dreams and make sure that you Dream the right Dream – the most suitable for your needs and pleasures.

name: Department of Tethered Aviation
description: The Department of Tethered Aviation is your BRC kite flying headquarters!  We sponsor the annual 420 Kite Fly.  Come by, pick up your kite, and learn to fly it.  Enjoy our interactive dome, flailing zone and the playa’s only batting cage. Nightly journeys  through the cosmos on our giant screen.

name: DESERT PEARL CANTINA
description: THINK: LOW KEY, OLD SCHOOL HANG, ANCIENT ELIXIRS OF THE COFFEE & TEA VARIETY, SHADY COMFORT, SCULPTURE GARDEN BIG SUR STYLE, CHI. ‘PLAYA FLEX’ HOURS.

name: Destiny Lounge
description: Enjoy the abundant shade in our cushy oasis while chilling to our DJ’s music, sipping an icy lemonade or ice tea, or participating in an acoustic jam around our piano. Then test your skills and teamwork on our giant challenge games: The Fling of Destiny and Rock Yer Balls!

name: DETH GILD TOO
description: Bacon, Bloody Mary’s, (de)Bauchery.

name: Deviant Playground
description: DP Camp (yes, that’s intentional) is designed to give adults a chance to relive their youth through games, activities, and varieties of play.  Come visit our bar, clubhouse, and playground! Look for us in the what/when/where.

name: Dilated Peoples Eye Spa
description: Evxpand your inner ision while indulging your senses… a soothing treatment of refreshing eye drops, cucumber slices and a cooling facial gel-pack… followed by a meditative lavender-scented eye-pillow surrounded by the enchanting healing powers of the Dilated Peoples Eye Spa.

name: Disaster Area
description: Disaster Area was formed out of the desire to bring large scale fire art to the public, and eventually to increase its profile to the point where Fire is as much of a draw at an event as the event entertainment itself.

name: Disgraceland
description: Performing art 10-20 people in Elvis suits with big hair.  A fake fur bar. Karaoke singing. Interactive games (invented by camp participants) Music. Assuming it is approved – (green themed Elvis art cart.  Camp has been traditionally very interactive and busy.

name: Disorient
description: After focusing on making the playa at-large happy for many years, Disorient is going to Deviate, turn the music down (slightly) and edge away from the public eye. The Drop is here, the Dome is back, get ready for new adventures on our magical Chariot of Bling! Welcome to DV8 (Disorient version 8)!

name: Diva Boot Camp
description: Put your face ON! Take your pants OFF!! and get on out there!!! DIVA STYLE! A DIVALICIOUS camp that will shake you down to your BOOTae! With live music, DJs, circus freaks, dance performance, trapeze artists and visual splendor in all forms…FUN, FUNKY and FABULOUS!

name: DMV
description: DMV is the BurningMan Department responsible to license Mutant Vehicles for use at BurningMan.

name: DodgePodge
description: DodgePodge challenges BRC denizens in memory melting rounds of Human-Hamster-Ball-Playa-Hockey. In our Court of Supreme Justice, events will change at the capricious whim of our court keeper. After a thorough pummeling with furry weapons, you can enjoy a liberty libation in our shady penalty bar.

name: Don't Ask A Texan
description: Proud purveyors of beverages, BBQ, and bad advice. Swing by from 11-2 ready to divulge all your problems and professionally trained, genuine Texans will provide the baddest advice on the playa. Stay and enjoy some hot BBQ and cool beverages including the “official” beer of real Texans, Lone Star.

name: Don't Poke The
description: A Support camp for the citzens OF BRC. Stop by from 2 Pm till 4 Pm Every day except Saturday and we will assist if we can.

name: doot doot BOOM!
description: doot doot BOOM! would like to present the interactive gallery: make art for our gallery to take art from our gallery!

name: Dr Le Taudrie's Freak Show
description: Do you feel like an outsider, a wild card, a loose wheel, maybe even a freak, when anywhere but at Burning Man? Then come on down and star in our Freak Show! While you’re here you may have a chance meeting with the world famous Dr Le Taudrie and he or she may even let you have a taste of Snake Oil.

name: Dr. Carl's Dept. of Collections
description: Dr. Carl’s big board of stuff is imposing, daunting and a little bit sexy. Pick something from our big board, go out and find that something.  Return to us, convince an official that you deserve a fantastic reward…collect a fantastic reward.

name: Dr. Fate's Potion Palace
description: Dr. Fate’s Potion Palace provides all-natural restorative tonics to wayward wanderers and wanton women of Black Rock City.  Spin the Wheel of Fate to guide you to your curative concoction.

name: Dust City Diner
description: A mobile diner that will appear in different deep-playa locations every night, from dusk ’till dawn, to serve great coffee and a variety of special, daily foods for those who will sit, read the paper, smoke and enjoy the company of a random group of weary travelers.

name: DUSTFISH
description: We are the missing tooth in the smile that is burningman.

name: E.Z.R.A. Presents: LIT UP
description: Somewhere in the night, far away from the bustle of the inner-city, lies a place where a new experience will be created…..WITH LIGHTS! In 2008, E.Z.R.A. Invites you to get LIT UP: A warm environment where you can interact socially with others; in a space to bring friends and make new ones. Abandon your boundaries and reinvent yourself here! This camp promises to be visually aesthetic and welcomes you home!! E.Z.R.A: Living the American Dream on the Playa since 2006.

name: Earth Guardians
description: Earth Guardians inspire our community to embrace LNT /Green principles. Hug the playa, then go beyond no trace and Green Your Burn. Join us for daily yoga, MOOPing, nature walks, hotspring patrol, classes and happy hour. Rest by our bar and expand your mind with our enviromental library and movies.

name: Earth Tribe Village/Flower of Life
description: Earth Tribe Village is composed of a global group of people. We manifests each year as a home for our these people. As well we strive to be environmentally friendly. We also run The Sound Stage “The flower of Life” on Esplanade which features an assortment of global dj’s and intentional seminars.

name: Easel Park
description: Easel Park has a collection of large, two dimensional paintings, displayed on over sized Easels, arranged in a circle, creating a large outdoor galleria one canvass will be painted during or Wednesday night party, another will be available all during the event to whom ever needs to paint and can.

name: eastern sierra burners
description: Eastern Sierra Burners

name: Ecosutra
description: Come experience a bukkake of fractal universes, hyper-dimensional nature films, and mind-expanding psychedelic visuals and audio of all varieties, engineered for your synaesthetic pleasure by the media gurus of MandelBot.tv, a forward-thinking collective of cultural engineers / djs / vjs / and visual artists devoted to developing new forms of mind-expanding media for the 21st century.

name: EE Camp
description: EE Camp: a MOBILE theme camp. Hosts: Environmental Encroachment, EE Marching Band, Chicago. A base for marching bands, wayward musicians, roaming paraders! A TRANSFORMATIONAL MARCHING BAND for planned or spontaneous events, ceremonies, processions, the Billion Bunny March, parades on the playa.

name: Ellipsis
description: Ellipsis– The combination of three types of art; sound, fire and lights all in one place.

name: Elven Nation
description: The Elven Nation was seeded in the frequency of the BC westcoast tribal dance community and the LA Gathering of the Tribes in Black Rock City in 2003.  Representing this intentional dance community the Elven Nation continues the vision of the Cosmic Elves by aligning and regrouping of elven tribes.

name: Energy Riders
description: The Energy Riders are a group of people whose mission is to harness collective energy so that everyone may ride it! Stop on by to help us build up the energy, dance to some funky beats, and chillax in our Love Jungle.

name: Entheon Village
description: Entheon Village is a gathering place for a worldwide community of visionaries collaborating to manifest healing changes to the earth and the global human community.

name: Epstein Barr & Lip-Sync Lounge
description: Epstein Barr & Lip-Sync Lounge will be serving up refreshing beverages to our patrons while you, the participant, lip-syncs to your favorite tune.  Live the American Dream of being rock star; no talent required.

name: Equilibrium
description: Come chillax and chat with the good peeps at Equilibrium.  Be sure to say hello to Michael.

name: Equipment yard Support Services
description: DPWs Support Services Div. Equipment Yard.

name: EXCESS
description: Camp Excess, screw moderation, we do everything in excess.

name: FALLOUT SHELTER
description: Fallout Shelter is going full tilt again this year with large tent, couches, large over stuffed pillows, carpet Den like atmosphere, with rock & Roll music, more colored lights, bar, indoor and outdoor relaxation. Outdoor large screen rock videos and or shawdow dancing. take a break, come on by.

name: Family of Friends
description: Our name says it all. We’re a Family of Friends. And when you come to our camp, you’re family. Relax on a bean bag in our cool shade, enjoy an icy cold beer, help yourself to a tasty snack, or bounce around on our huge trampoline.

name: Fandango
description: Fandango welcomes you back to our Playa, and invites you to come by for a barter-free cocktail at the Slowburn Lounge.  We’ll have the high-striker, rock and funk DJs,and the Black Rock Broadcasting Corporation’s World Headquarters, offering the world-wide simulcast of this year’s Bootie:BRC.

name: Fickleodeon
description: Fickleodeon: random, quick-hit, ever-changing and sometimes spontaneous theater, will provide both a stationary and mobile venue for rare and ridiculous performances. In camp, a bar, lounge and stage. On the road, Mobileodeon, will award starring roles and cold beverages to thespians everywhere!

name: Fiery Fractals
description: We are the Fiery Fractals.

name: Fifth Dimension
description: Fifth Dimension Village Includes Putt Putt Playa, The Philadelphia Experiment, Camp BBC & The Chorus of Dreams. Through various Creative outlets the Fifth Dimension will offer a diversity of interactive experiences that are auditory, visual, physical, emotional and experiential. This is 24/7.

name: Fire Conclave Convergence
description: Mandatory check in point for all members of the Fire Conclave. Members of Reno’s fire group welcome all members of the fire community. Check out the happenings with fire art on the playa. Ambient drummers are welcome to join fire activities.

name: First Republic of Slacking
description: Does your homeland not reflect your true ideals?  Are you looking for a new spiritual home?  The First Republic of Slacking will be accepting asylum application for the first time ever at Burning Man 2008.  Slackers spend their days dancing, chilling, hooping, sunning and meditating.

name: First Transdimensional Bank
description: While other banking institutions offer easy answers and convenient solutions, we at the First Transdimensional Bank promise difficult questions and intractable problems. Everyone already has an account, so you might want to use our Karmic Teller Machine (KTM) to check your balance.

name: fixxxation station
description: Through the creative and concsious efforts of its members, Fixxxation Station thrives on a common goal of community interactivity:  We provide BRC with an environment that stimulates the senses and soul.  Doing so through interactive art, music, yoga, massage, conversation and libations.

name: FLARETOPIA
description: FLARETOPIA – BRC’s Ole Tyme Foto Booth – We’ll add flare, then shoot you. B.Y.O.C (Bring your own camera)

name: Flattery Camp
description: Flattery Camp returns to the neighborhood to unleash a contagion of flattery. Be flattered and/or join us in the fine art of flattery as the fabulous citizens of Black Rock pass by. We aim for sincerety, originality, humor, and comfort in the shade.

name: Fort Kanuckistan
description: Straight outta the Empty Quarter!  Featuring Old Country Vodka Snorting Bar, 4th annual Xeni Cup street hockey tournament (Hockey Night in Kanuckistan), Royal Canadian Kilted Yaksmen, Purgatory mutant vehicle base, Royal Kanuckistan Navy navigation beacon.

name: FREE Hookah Tent
description: Free Tent. Four Big Hookahs. over 20 flavors. Pillows. chill music.

name: Free Photography Zone
description: Free Photography Zone has been photographing, in a studio setting, and giving prints to the participants of Burning Man since 1996.  Each year each person photographed is given a Polaroid print of themselves as a tangible reminder of their time at Burning Man

name: Freedelicious
description: Freedelicious is a welcoming, fun and creative space for exploring freedom, self-expression and the meaning of the American Dream… Please join us in the comfortable chill space of our dome for: Yummy American treats, happy hour DJ sets, Reality TV interpretation and paint-dancing celebrations.

name: Freedom lounge
description: AMERICA – LAND OF THE “FREE”.  The Freedom Lounge offers a safe atmosphere to let the Spirit revive you.  The perfect place to make a new start and leave the past.  new direction, healing, spiritual cleansing, dream interpretation and connection with your original purpose.

name: Freedomcommunity
description: Freedomcommunity challenges everyone to be their highest self.

name: FreeStyle Palace
description: FreeStyle Palace hosted by TripKnight LLC and LawyersforBurners.com proudly announces its ensemble performance for Burning Man 2008: FreeStyle Palace Sings Songs of Freedom.  Our gift to the Black Rock City this year will be the creation of a melting pot of music, dance and visual arts manifesting personal or collective songs of freedom.

name: Frogma
description: Frogma is the little theme camp that could, where everyone is your friend and neighbor! Hop on over to our lily pads Monday through Thursday at 5:00pm for BRC’s one and only Hoppy Hour.

name: Fu*king Unicorn Camp
description: In our American Dreams we see Unicorns from all corners of the Unicorn Universe coming together to frolick in rainbow waterfalls, to gallop about freely, and to hump!  Come by our camp for a “Mystical Creatures Party”,”Floating or Fucking Unicorns” picture sessions and other magical happenings!

name: Funky Town
description: Funky Town is a group of Montana Djs and friends who love music, sun and yard games.  Come dance, enjoy a drink and play some of the hottest yard games while listening to the best club tunes these djs can play.

name: Furniture Car Rally Camp
description: Come one, come all, with your mobile furniture to the Furniture Car Rally!  Meet us Thursday afternoon at 2:00 for fun, games, prizes, and, of course, to see tons of furniture on wheels.

name: FusionValley
description: Fusion Valley, will be offering an internet cafe, stop by enjoy our carpeted 30×30 shade. We’ll have couches, computers, music, movies, painting, games, and other fun activities. We also have black light art, and many paintings, some will be gifted. Also come by and cross the Continental Divide!

name: Fuurther
description: What is the american dream if not the drive to go fuurther? We want to bring immediate questions into consciousness and awaken our inner human beings. Come here to mystically ponder, experience soul reverberations, and to contribute to transcending the stereotypes of today.

name: Ganeshs Playa Maya US
description: Ganeshs Playa Maya US is about overcoming obstacles to consciousness evolution in the grand American dream of Burning Man.  Maya in India is the great dream we usually consider reality.  Ganesh helps overcome the obstacle of desert heat with an afternoon open bar in a large Rajasthani desert tent.

name: Garage Mahal
description: Our art car, the Floating Palace of Pleasure has been bumpin funky beats on the Playa since 2002.  Relax to down tempo chill grooves in the afternoon before an evening on our art-car. Were an eclectic collection of individuals committed to spreading peace, love, and dance on the Playa as well as in our everyday lives. On the playa since 2001.

name: Garden of Hedon
description: Our Garden of Earthly Delights; sonorous music, friendly folk, some natural and unnatural fauna.  All fluidly maintained by our white picket fence of love, use it to proudly display your photo of moments of burn love; that glance you caught, that kiss you saw, or those dusty hands holding each other.

name: Gedi Prime
description: We play with fire, do tricks for treats, take pictures of just about everything, then laugh some more. Stop on by & take a look at the last 8 years of good times in the Gallery of Conciousness-American Dream Style of course! 3 giant burn barrels and tons of fire art will keep ya warm all night long!

name: Genital Portrait Studio
description: At Genital Portrait Studio, highly trained photographers offer you the opportunity capture that special side of yourself in the privacy of our playa studio.  Your session may include a number of props and positions, and you can walk away with your very own Genital ID card.

name: Get Lost
description: Get Lost!  We’re all here because we’re not all there.

name: Get Nailed Salon
description: Our goal is to add color to peoples lives through their nails. We know how grimey everyone’s nails get out on the playa during Burning Man. We would like to beautify hands throughout Black Rock City by offering nail painting. We will be open Tuesday through Friday from 5-6p (Saturday 4-5p).

name: Gifted camp
description: Gifted camp – were all the people in our camp are gifted – (though everyone can join as well -if we have more space), we might randomly gift some people, and we would enjoy BM. we have some folks from israel, some from Cali and some good times – since we are going to give and to get gifted.

name: Gigsville
