description: Sumcamp has: A bar “The Lemon Drop” open 9am till 9pm with free coffee and pancakes for the early birds, live music and DJ guest. A movie theater showing movies thru the day on the american dream. And live visuals by POPSmaroon. We will have a daily mask making and jewlery class

name: Sunrise Coffee Camp
description: Come over and visit us from sunrise until our pots run dry.  We will share hot coffee and all the fixings with you to greet the new day or finally send you off to bed!  Stay to decorate our graffiti wall.  Use of personal cups is greatly appreciated.

name: Sunvalley
description: In our 11th year on the playa, we would like to honor our country and city with more blinky goodness.  What good is a walk on the Esplanade without blinky lights from Sunvalley Theme Camp.  Your home for all that is bright.

name: Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious
description: Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious is a traveling performance art camp on a mission to awe and amaze, or at least give a little laugh.  Comprised of some of the best CO Fire Spinners as well as a plethora of other equally “Super” Humans.

name: SurlyCamp
description: SurlyCamp, home to the SurlyBird, a bio-diesel bird of epic proportions.  SurlyCamp specializes in the little smokey and Baconator cook offs, fresh beats and a ribald sense of humor. Go Big and Go Time…that is how the Surlies roll.

name: Suspense Camp
description: Suspense Camp is dedicated to American-style full-suspension bondage: part kinetic art, part thrill ride, part endorphin rush. Our crew of expert riggers will put on public performances in a number of different styles as well as teaching workshops for all levels and offering bondage rides.

name: Sweaty Betty's Misting Parlor
description: Rejuvenate, invigorate and experience an overall cooling sensation from head to foot as you stroll through our misting tunnel and watch the smiles emerge while body temperatures drop. Open each afternoon during peak heat on the playa.

name: Tarotist Training Camp
description: Our resident tarotist will provide a complimentary and terrifying card reading!

name: Tast-E-Vin Camp
description: The American dream, boxed wine and cheezw whiz for your tssting pleasure. Check the signs for the days and times for your tasting pleasure.

name: Tasty Camp
description: Stuff your face!! Stomp your feet!! Tasty is a collective of friends who love good food as much as they love good music. Come visit us any time with something tasty to prepare and share with a stranger on our community grill. Or come by at Tasty Hour for some fresh gourmet goodness on the house!!

name: Temple Camp
description: We will be building this year’s temple, called Basura Sagrada.  We build art out of trash for many reasons. Our goal is to make something amazing and exotic out of materials deemed unworthy, the stuff we throw away everyday.

name: Temple of the 7th Ray
description: We seek to bring the two together. The Temple is to promote a safe space for intimacy, contact and connection between people. We are here to inspire a unity consciousness (including others and including ourselves) and continuing toward fully embracing the Divine we all share.

name: Tennis Camp
description: Martina fell in love with Steffi. Chris changed her name from Evert to Lloyd. Bjorn’s beard got caught in the net. Boris was always at an advantage. And the Queen thought John terribly rude. The glory days – of proper tennis whites, wooden rackets, and Pimm’s in the Royal Enclosure – return!\

name: Tequila Shack
description: Warning, Do not visit the Tequila Shack. All trespassers will be shot with a TEQUILA SHOT Shooting daily from 4 to 5.PM Monday through Saturday.

name: Terminal City
description: Terminal City  Your Sub-Culture Suburbia, and defenders of Freedoom and Doomocracy. Terminal Citys theme camp districts include APOKILIPTIKA, Espresso Camp, MASH 4207th, The Booby Bar, Herring Camp, Shuttle Base Galileo, 667-Nieghbors of the Beast, Sex Filth Avenue and Diva Den of Desire.

name: That Bloody Camp
description: Ater a year of rest, That Bloody Camp returns with its haven of morning-after repose. We will cut through the dust of the playa and the previous night’s excesses with spicy bloody marys and even spicier servers.  And of course we will give you space to relax, connect and maybe even make a new friend.

name: The Americas' Immigrant Camp
description: The USA and Mexico join to celebrate the migration to Burning Man.  A festive migrant camp with a well stocked tequilla bar.

name: The Black Rock Country Club
description: An unprecedented private destination club, Black Rock Country Club is for members who appreciate first rate croquet and relaxing under a warm summer night sky. BRCC has offered its exclusive membership a social life of top notch refinement in a five-star service environment.

name: The Blacklight Aquarium
description: Visit Blaqua’s Immigration Station and test for naturalization so you, too, can live the American Dream. Pass, and you will be conferred citizenship and receive a personalized passport. Fail, and you may just get a green card. Also, stop by for an evening of aquatic espionage on James Spawn night.

name: The Booby Bar
description: The B(o)(o)by Bar, a social gathering place for new and returning burners alike, consists of two well-tanned domes that house the best damned bar on the playa. The B(o)(o)by Bar is a theatrically interactive place have a drink, meet new friends, laugh, and enjoy each day of life in BRC. Come see us!

name: The Bouncy Bouncy Club.
description: The jolly nice place to bounce.  We will also have huge inflatable dome with dj’s dancing and performance art.  The Wilson Phillips Pancake Breakfast occurs at 10am on Sunday.

name: The Deep End
description: High Spirits, Deep Grooves

name: The Duck Pond
description: Our day party offers 100 feet of side-by-side slip-n-slide, a bustling bar, roof-deck panoramas and DJ’s.  After dark the focus is on Zam Zam, a bar both lively and relaxing, where friends can sit, drink, and enjoy live music, cabaret, and each other… What more could any American Dreamer want?

name: The Dump
description: Galvanized banjos and basses invented from trash can parts, swing dancers, horn players, hula-hoopers, drummers, and vintage decorations create a ‘recycling’ theme camp unlike any other.  Dump yourself in our innovative trash heap to experience the delightful sights and sounds of a bygone era.

name: The Elders
description: “The Elders” are providing Brie, Bach, & Talk from 4:00 to 6:00 each day. Join us for a snack of Brie (and other cheeses too), crackers, a glass of wine, some soothing music (not all Bach), and lot’s of conversation. Other activities: community art & the  “Why Clothes” nude art bike ride.

name: The Exploratorium
description: Come hang out with fun, open, happy people. Come one, come all, come now!

name: The Fashion Show Camp
description: Fashion Shows every day, Photographers, paparazzi, green room to chill, party every night. Bring your best costume, get creative with body paint and walk the runway live the Fashion Lifestyle – we will display the best and worst fashion pictures on the Hall of Fame and Hall of Shame billboards (8×10)

name: The Get Lit Asylum
description: Burner Vets and Virgins Alike: Come Get Lit at the Get Lit Asylum! Stay visible to art cars, mobile art and drunken bikers! Come kick it, we will get you decked in some awesome glo wear and maybe (if yer lucky) you will even catch some live music by Reno band Sinicle! Remember:Don’t get hit, get lit!

name: The Gold Fever Gang
description: We’ve been digging deep for the American dream but coming up with nothing but fool’s gold.  Now the whole gang’s got the fever.  Come revel in the lavish glow of our Golden Calf bar on wheels, complete with anatomically correct drink dispenser.

name: The Hive
description: The Hive Village is a collection of allied theme camps bringing light sculpture, hearth warming public space, performance, curious liquids, !fractals, hammock towers, bands, djs, dancing, workshops, stilter libations, and other odd and unusual offerings to the playa.

name: The Hookah Lounge
description: Come to the Hookah Lounge and enjoy our premium flavored tobaccos, teas, and coffee. Our Moroccan style lounge serves up shisha filtered through juice and water every night. The plush seating, soft carpeting, and great people make this the ultimate chill-out zone.

name: The Knarly Carnival
description: The Knarly Carnivals are back again with a great Moroccon tent, cold hard apple cider and fresh smoked turkey! This year we will be doing foot washing at the tent during the day and its a great place to rest and stay out of the sun for a while

name: The Man - a museum II
description: Interested in learning about the ritual and traditions of Burning Man?  Come visit The Man – a museum.  Meet one of the Man builders during our Margarita party!  Touch a replica of one of the Man’s arms!

name: The ManifeStation
description: The ManifeStation returns to offer the sensual, refreshing and creative experience of plaster body casting to the playa. Offer your body part’s shape to our effigy for immolation at the week’s end.

name: The Necklace Factory
description: The Necklace Factory is a Necklace Design Studio and Production Factory located in Fabulous Downtown Black Rock City.  Please visit this Oasis of Delight and Aesthetic Adventure.  The materials and instruction are free.  Bring your manners, your good taste, and enough time to create a masterpiece.

name: The Pepper Conduit
description: We are the Pepper Conduit, flying both the rainbow flag and its black and blue cousin.  Experienced Burners (and one sacrifical virgin), unite in the twin American dreams of alternative energy and cheerful sexuality. Pick up some free hemp bondage rope, or stay to try it out!

name: The Pickle Joint
description: Back in the saddle doing what we do best:  serving up the cold, crisp, brisk, delicious pickles and pickle martinis you know and love.  The Pickle Joint, giving till it hurts.

name: THE Playa Security Agency
description: Playa Security Agency BRC is a dangerous place, but don’t worry, the Playa Security Agency is committed to your safety. Agents are always on the lookout for IEDs (improvised entertainment diversions) and will keep you apprised of the current threat level.

name: The Red Eye
description: The waking American dream.

name: The Reno Housewives
description: Helping dress BRC since 1998. If you need bridesmaids for your playa wedding, ask us! (References upon request)

name: The Rue Morgue
description: The Rue Morgue/ Home of The Blood Vessel mutant hearse and The Last Caress a 22 foot coffin trailer – A safe place to say your farewells to loved ones of the past. Learn how to fold an origami crane to be deposited in one of our hand made coffins and taken to The Temple of Community burn.

name: The Rue Morgue
description: The Rue Morgue/ Home of The Blood Vessel mutant hearse and The Last Caress a 22 foot coffin trailer – A safe place to say your farewells to loved ones of the past. Learn how to fold an origami crane to be deposited in one of our hand made coffins and taken to The Temple of Community burn.

name: The TempleWhore Outpost
description: Smaller this year, but present, blessed, and Kali-kissed! Come by and see our list of classes on tantra, Reiki, entheogens, and polyamory — or get some Reiki lovin’ from a whore. Ain’t nothing more temple than that. Still serving up the Love after all these years, one soul, and one body at a time.

name: The Time Colony
description: The Historical Preenactment Society welcomes all appreciators of science and the mysteries  and wonders of past and future. Here Victorian-aged gentiles may drink along side space robots, etc., and time travelers of any era are welcome to relax and enjoy the moment.

name: The Tittyman Camp
description: The Tittyman, Was commanded by God to go to the desert.  To Build a City, A city made of tittys.  If Tittyman built a city of tittys and did not covet thy titty.  God said they would come two by two.  For 10 years, Tittyman and his titty crew has been building a City Of Tittys in Black Rock City.

name: The Twenty-first Amendment
description: The Twenty-first Amendment to the United States Constitution repealed the Eighteenth Amendment to the United States Constitution, which had mandated nationwide Prohibition.

name: The Wanderer's Camp aka PreBurners
description: Our Camp is an oasis on the playa offering information about the Black         Rock’s early inhabitants/explorers, provided on a kiosk for all to enjoy.         This year is dedicated to Jeff Wenner aka “The Wanderer”, longtime Burner         who wandered into the spirit world. We are having a sunrise ceremony in         his honor.

name: THEME Camp
description: A simpler place of fun and singing. Themes of everything you remember will be sung or re-hashed.

name: Thrillpeddlers
description: Thrillpeddlers are a San Francisco based performance troupe specializing in Grand Guignol and Theater of the Ridiculous.

name: Tierre del Fuego
description: Place your dreams on our “delFuego wall of Peaceful interactive painting”. Have your future and present dreams examined by the “Runes”. And there is always something dreamy going on with the “Tarot Cards”. Who knows…you might even find a Martini Party going on!!!

name: Tikidom
description: Tikidom will be the home for Tabitha (mutant vehicle) and Tia (mutant trailer). Tia will wear 3 different disguises–1) Tia’s Taxi, public transportation; 2) Tia’s Quesdillas, serve quesadillas to the starving masses at midnight on the playa; 3) Tia’s stage, a platform for live band performances.

name: TikiFuckos
description: TikiFuckos will be having a night club, fire play and movies.

name: Time of Your Life!
description: What time is it? It’s the Time of Your Life and we want to take you to glorious Cost Rica. Chill in our 44’dome/rainforest. Sit in the lush grass and listen to the serene sounds of the howler monkey, toucan, waterfalls. Drink hot cocoa from CR w/homemade Kahlua. Dance to our jammin’ DJs. Bring drums.

name: Tissue and a Plan
description: ‘Cause all you really need is a tissue and a plan… Lost? Confused? Runny nose? Don’t know what to go do next? In its inaugural year, Camp Tissue and a Plan is dedicated to making sure no burner wanders the playa without a clear plan and a clean tissue.  All week long we will have a goodly supply of tissues each with a different plan written on them. We figure that every burner could use a spare tissue, and many could have anywhere from casual to dire need of a plan. We will also be hosting a number of planned events that we would like you to attend! From “Mojito Monday” to “Dance till you Die,” and for those really tricky questions.. you will have an opportunity to “Ask the Monkey”.

name: Titicaca
description: Sunset over a high mountain Peruvian lake.  The scent of roasted chestnuts wafting on a fall breeze.  The dead leaves lie huddled and still, no longer blown hither and tither…

name: ToneAge - American Dreamz
description: ToneAge  American Dreamz is where weary souls find restoration in lucid beats, chill domes, radical veggieclusiveness and costumed cocktails (aye aye!): participate as we flash back in time to reawaken the story of prom – gone right  where we are forever coming of age.

name: Tot Lounge
description: Got kids? Tired out? Come join us at the Tot Lounge, relax and rejuvenate! A chill spot for tots and their tag-along parents.

name: TOTEM Massage & Chill
description: TOTEM returns to BRC for its 11th consecutive year. TOTEM features a dozen massage tables, 200 seats in our chill lounge, and beverage service, in our huge dust-free air-conditioned tent. New for 2008: cocktails will be served from 8pm to 10pm TUE-FRI. Please join us!

name: Transmorphagon
description: The Transmorphagon has as many sides as it currently has, and continues to get more sides every day.  Live music, clinical psychologicians on staff, a space faring vessel, geometric shapes of laser light and the possibility of random experiences.  Bring your face to our faces.

name: Treasury Department
description: What’s the American Dream all about but the love of money. So stop by the Treasury Department and print up some useless HARVEY dollars for yourself.

name: Tribal Thunder
description: We Like to Drink We Like To Drum

name: Troop 69
description: We are the Girl Scout troop of Black Rock City! Everyday we will be delivering cookies to the citizens of Black Rock City.  Join us in the evening for burlesque shows in the Red Light Lounge.

name: True Prophet
description: Please join us for an introductory salon on the art of Ontological Warfare over tea and hookahs. For initiates we’ll be offering first-level sensory disillusionment sessions to first bring Mind back to where it Matters.

name: Truthiness
description: The truthiness camp is willing to indoctrinate you into the Republican Model of right and wrong (we are always right). Daily activities include: the word of the day, the joke of the day, and updates to on notice, fake Stephen Sightings, and games. We will also be collecting registrations for the Colbert Nation Covenants.

name: TV Free Burning Man
description: TV Free Burning Man is back to help YOU create BRC’s only pirate TV station! Join us at our Outdoor Cinema for nightly screenings and step into our new Media Dome to upload your photos, videos, and personal messages from the playa to our special website to share with all your off-playa friends.

name: Two Lanterns Camp
description: Get hooked-up to your current playa-mate with an Unofficial Playa Civil Union (includes an official-looking document) in the Chapel of Liberty. Hate your playa-mate? Get a Black Rock Temporary Divorce, good until Labor Day. Lady Lib towers over us and be sure to obey our four-way traffic signal.

name: Uli Baba and the Horny Thieves
description: A few cool cats in a Moroccan tent selling slaves, making masks, and rocking       out.

name: Ultra Stunt Danger Academy
description: The Ultra Stunt Danger Academy is all about distinction. We search for         the distinction between rational fear and irrational fear, and try to         push the boundaries between. We examine the distinction between authority         and compliance, and have been known to disturb the social fabric along         these seams. We also play with big robots. We’re naughty like that.

name: Uncharted Territories
description: Come to the Uncharted Territories of Avalon Village to our Queer Talking         Circle Discussions! If you are wondering where all the queers are on the         playa, Avalon Village is a queer/queer friendly oasis! The Uncharted Territories         is one of our camps. Come find us!

name: Unicornios Satanicos
description: Wouldn’t Satanism be a lot better if it had more pink? Unicornios Satanicos         is a gay-friendly Satanic ministry designed to put the fun back in heresy.         Take a bounce on our pink fuzzy crucifix too!

name: Universitas Scholarium
description: Universitas Scholarium is a group of students, scholars and like-minded individuals from a university community and beyond. We especially welcome kids to visit our theme camp!  We will host special activities for kids each morning at 9:30 including storytelling, creative movement, & other fun events.

name: Untied Nations Embassy
description: Awarded “Best-Pub-on-Playa, 2007”, the Flying Monkey returns as The Embassy         offering American Dreamers views from around the world. With some of Europe’s         finest DJs and a different national theme hosted every day, expect non-stop         action with heavy doses of English eccentricity. In NYrvana Village.

name: UrbanArtFarm/BlackRockCityBallet
description: The Urban Art Farm is creating a performance environment for the inaugural         season of Black Rock city Ballet. This environment will include a 1200         sqr ft stage and interactive installations. We will be hosting daily classes         and workshops as well as creating original Ballets for evening performances

name: VAMP CAMP
description: Come by and enjoy the outdoor Vamp Camp lounge and try some vamp juice.         You will find a relaxing setting with friendly vampers and burners. Also         for your use and enjoyment partake in BRC only fully functional bidet.

name: Vedges & Gimps Camp
description: Vedges & Gimps Camp returns to BRC, this time alongside Hot Wheelz Camp.         Both camps are here in service & support of BRC’s handi-capable citizens         to aid in their effort to traverse, explore & enjoy Burning Man. We bring         vehicles ready to transport those who really need it.

name: VegCamp
description: VegCamp invites people to consider the environmental impacts of animal agriculture and the ways in which humanity’s actions affect non-human animals. We will have videos, vegan food, cooking demos, lectures, literature, a reference library, and interactive art.

name: Velvet Soul Mine
description: Velvet Soulmine Saloon and Dance Hall is a cozy chill space where you         can indulge in Southern hospitality mixed with Western resolve. This year         the Soul mine has hit the mother load and we are living large. Come enjoy         the boom right before it all goes bust.

name: Vertical Camp
description: At Vertical Camp we answer the Burning Question–“What happens when BRC         runs out of space?” The answer is simple– We go Vertical! Come breathe         the fresh air of dense urban living at its best. Visit our rooftop deck         and check out the Man from the top of BRC’s first and finest Condo Hi-Rise.

name: Videogasm
description: Videogasm featuring independent / experimental video art on our three         screens, nightly at Snowflake Village. Home of the renowned spray paint         artists, The Spray Dogs. Come by and get tagged! Contact us if you have         an original video you’d like to show at our Playa Theatre.

name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Camp
description: Come out of the sun, into the shade and drink some very tasty Vietnamese         Iced Coffee, aka Crack-In-A-Cup!! We are located in Avalon Village, usually         serving from around 12noon to around 4pm, in Quixote’s of Avalon. Cups         provided!!

name: Vinland
description: In 1003, Leif Erikson founded Vinland, the first European settlement in         North America. Though it no longer stands, its descendants live on. Join         us at Vinland to celebrate his legacy by learning songs and stories, feasting         upon beef and mead, and sharing with us the joy and freedom of a new world.

name: Voodoo Bistro
description: The VooDoo Bistro exists as a spiritual center to all of Black Rock City.         Not only do the devotees that call The Bistro home perform the VooDoo         rites, but we act as an outreach to the Burning Man Community by inviting         participation in the rites and guidance on how to affect your universe         through VooDoo practice.

name: Voted Best Camp
description: Nothing complicated here folks. Nightly Punk Rock mayhem drenched in beer         and whiskey with amazing displays of skateboarding. We have a bar, a stage,         and an halfpipe; everything else is just dress up. Please be advised that         when night falls we are rated R and the kiddies should stay back at camp.

name: VW Bus Camp
description: VW Bus Camp welcomes all arriving in a VW Bus or other unique camping         vehicle to join our camp. Visit us and experience the unique American         Dream that comes from experienced Burners still driving these archaic         and slow vehicles, hula hooping to a non-stop 4th of July, dreaming of         strong tail winds!

name: Water Works
description: Reggae, hip hop, funk, jazz, and all music full of soul. Classical early         in the morning, but don’t hit the Souza Alarm…it’s there to get you         going. Oh, and we’ll have plenty of water and other beverages to quench         your thirst. Stop into the Water Works and join us for some weirdness.

name: Wedding Camp (aka Heavenly Swing)
description: Come spin the Wheel-o-Wedding; let chaos be your wedding planner: be it         Catholic, Moonie or Elvis; walk down the aisle with that American Dream         of yours! No partner? Already hitched? No problem! If it moves, you can         marry it. Uncle Hal’s Quickie Divorces: open as long as life ain’t perfect.

name: Wheeeee!Ville
description: WHEEEEE!Vilee Having more fun than you since 2004! W!V will once again become the home in the dust for the 3playa community, a virtual group that spans the globe loosely disorganized around it’s own fecund bulletin board interaction.  W!V is the result.  It’s our collective gift to Black Rock City.

name: Wheel of Karma
description: A Cornerstone of the bicycle adventure circle ! Rotating for position         and pleasure,your experience should be of trust,so with a limited attention         span your destiny will be fulfilled

name: Where's Waldo? Camp
description: Howdy all you Playa Goers!!! Join your old pal Waldo as he adventures         through the wacky wonderland of Black Rock City. The search is on! Have         YOU found Waldo yet?

name: Whiskey & Insults
description: Not for the faint of character (or liver), the Whiskey & Insults camp         will serve up shots of whiskey while insulting anything and everything         within mocking distance. Make no mistake, you will be insulted, but those         that can insult our sharp-witted bartenders will be held in the highest         regard.

name: Whiskey & Whores Saloon
description: No cocktail shakers. No swizzle sticks. This ain’t Sex in the City…it’s         a one-drink bar with a no-cup policy and alcohol so strong there’s no         need to wash that shotglass you just shared. “We got Whisky, we got Whores,         what else do you fuckin’ need?!!!” For the past 5 years we’ve been a major         meeting spot for the New York community and entertaining everyone else         who stops by along the way. We whores have been both fueling and escaping         the American Dream for years, so we’ve got our place on classic Main Street         USA. Politicians, preachers, pimps, performers…we don’t care. Give us         your passion and a loud YEE-HAW, and we’ll give you a shot on the stage.

name: White Dragon Noodle Bar
description: We will serve stunningly delicious noodles with shiitake mushrooms every         day at sundown. Come explore our surly attitudes and dangerous drinks.         Fire our burn-off tower. Learn to play the bassoon. View the whole city         from our tower.

name: WigTown
description: The Heart of WigTown has Infinite Love for You! The place we will create;         surreal and splendid. We always go with each other’s flow, in lingerie,         sounds like a shindig. Now don’t you even think to say no. With Infinite         Gratitude we affiliates of WIG paste and cut and paint and celebrate making         a Wonder Inside Guise, Dig? Anything we try can penetrate the mind state         of those who swallow our bait. While they create and recreate in our shade,         no one getting paid, they REcharge and watch the tap tap tapps at the         Depot. Not on the downlow, will be a satellite show of solar power and         maybe solar shower! Love you Wiglets look forward to living with you again         on the playa!

name: Wishing Star Camp
description: Wish upon a Star! Come to Wishing Star Camp and make a Wish that will         burn in the Temple to join the Stars in the heavens. Will you Wish for         something for yourself? A friend? Money/Fame/Power? Health/Love/Knowledge/Peace?         That special friend? A long hot shower? We Wish you positive intentions…

name: yes please
description: the answer to every question is yes please!

name: Yogi & Delta's Asana-Mania
description: A reality-defying Yoga camp. Please check calendar or visit for scheduled         & drop-in classes daily.

name: You Are Here
description: You Are Here helps you find your place in space and time. Enjoy an illuminating         visit to the Black Rock City Historical Museum, which documents the rich         history of our city over the centuries, then consider your new perspective         on location in our eye-catching sculpture.

name: You Know You Want it, Want it
description: Visit YKYWIWI throughout the week for all your interactive needs. This         year, The Battle Kandy Zombie Tribe will once again present This American         Life Tea and Story Time (back for the third year), our Intergalactic Licensing         Bureau will also be in full force.

name: Yummy RUMInations
description: Home to the fabulous Yum Cart. Hospitality services by day and Rumi readings         by night.

name: Yurt Cafe
description: The Yurt Cafe will feature afternoon tea, shady refuge, and impromptu         dust storm parties. Thursday evening at 5pm the Yurt Cafe will host a         smoked salmon reception with mint juleps.

name: Zanzibar
description: Zanzibar is an opulent interactive chill space. Come have a drink, dance,         relax, whatever and enjoy what we’re spinning. You know that favorite         club/lounge that you have stumbled across in your travels, well we have         it on the playa. Chill in our beautiful Moroccan bar and lounge area,         under our cool silver sun shade, over shimmering azure Astro Turf, giving         you the feel of being in a cool pool, surrounded by sheer blue curtained         walls with beautiful couches, chairs and cushions, under ambient lighting.         If the winds up, or you desire a more intimate setting, come join us in         our transcendent Yurt, resplendent in carpets, tapestries, cushions and         altars. Enjoy hula hooping, yoga and spontaneous belly dancing. Get a         henna tattoo, and if youre lucky, someone with their eye on your business,         might just style you out with something to further brighten your mood.

name: ZENER Camp / The Tuck Republic
description: Come test your psychic potential with our ZENER Wheels! Telepathy, Clairvoyance,         Precognition, and more may be discovered at our Psychic Proving Grounds!         Also, Tuck will be conquering Burning Man and claiming it for Spain.

name: Zombie Unicorn
description: The Zombie Unicorn camp is a costumed fete of water shooters, chopstick         feeders, Exodus pep people and all things quite literal and not.

name: ZONDERNAAM
description: Community Closet and Chill Space. We have a colorful shady daytime oasis         (complete with Reclinerator), for relaxing to lounge music and enjoying         good company. Our daytime Community Closet rack is full of crazy sparkly         shiny sexy items…and our motto is, “Take a piece, leave a hug!”

name: Zookeeperz Camp
description: The Zookeeprz of Missoula Montana are a core group of friends and family         representing heavy bass and party culture for the Zootown Massif. We feature         multiple bands, electronic music producers, DJs, VJs, party promoters,         and all around Zootown Underground Entertainment Ninjas. Come get down!!!
